thread.title: Syrian forces attempt to split rebel enclave in half

title: Syrian forces attempt to split rebel enclave in half
text:
Syrian forces attempt to split rebel enclave in half 8:49am GMT - 01:16 
Syrian government forces pounded the rebel enclave of Ghouta anew in an effort to slice the territory in two, what may amount to the opposition's biggest defeat since 2016. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Syrian government forces pounded the rebel enclave of Ghouta anew in an effort to slice the territory in two, what may amount to the opposition's biggest defeat since 2016.
